code: import{FAVORITE_ADD_ITEM_START,FAVORITE_ADD_ITEM_SUCCESS,FAVORITE_REMOVE_ITEM_START,FAVORITE_REMOVE_ITEM_SUCCESS,FAVORITE_ITEMS_WEATHER_REQUEST,FAVORITE_ITEMS_WEATHER_SUCCESS,FAVORITE_ITEMS_WEATHER_FAIL,FAVORITE_ITEMS_WEATHER_RESET,FAVORITE_ITEMS_WEATHER_START}from'./favoritesConstants';import{errorHandler}from'../helper/errorHandler';export var addItemToFavoritesStart=function addItemToFavoritesStart(favoriteCityName){return{type:FAVORITE_ADD_ITEM_START,payload:favoriteCityName};};export var addItemToFavoritesSuccess=function addItemToFavoritesSuccess(favoriteCityName){return{type:FAVORITE_ADD_ITEM_SUCCESS,payload:favoriteCityName};};export var removeItemFromFavoritesStart=function removeItemFromFavoritesStart(favoriteCityName){return{type:FAVORITE_REMOVE_ITEM_START,payload:favoriteCityName};};export var removeItemFromFavoritesSuccess=function removeItemFromFavoritesSuccess(_ref){var favoriteCityName=_ref.payload;return{type:FAVORITE_REMOVE_ITEM_SUCCESS,payload:favoriteCityName};};export var getFavoritesWeatherReset=function getFavoritesWeatherReset(){return{type:FAVORITE_ITEMS_WEATHER_RESET};};export var getFavoritesWeatherStart=function getFavoritesWeatherStart(){return{type:FAVORITE_ITEMS_WEATHER_START};};export var getFavoritesWeatherRequest=function getFavoritesWeatherRequest(){return{type:FAVORITE_ITEMS_WEATHER_REQUEST};};export var getFavoritesWeatherSuccess=function getFavoritesWeatherSuccess(cityWeatherData){return{type:FAVORITE_ITEMS_WEATHER_SUCCESS,payload:cityWeatherData};};export var getFavoritesWeatherError=function getFavoritesWeatherError(error){return{type:FAVORITE_ITEMS_WEATHER_FAIL,payload:errorHandler(error)};};
